Reviews.Title: Gravity II
Reviews.Author: Irritated
Reviews.Content: I have now had three Samsung Gravity II phones, two of which were purchased from OEM Shop, and they all have the same problem: after a few weeks, the screen gets all wonky and starts displaying images both backwards and upside down.  Not cool.

Reviews.Title: Its a QWERTY phone, with "mediocre" extras
Reviews.Author: Thomas J. Hornik "gtbino1"
Reviews.Content: I've had my t469 for exactly 2 years now (purchased in Spring 2010). I was a t-mobile (US) customer, and I used this phone in the US (primarily) but I also traveled with it extensively to the UK & Europe. The multi-band ability to use CDMA and GSM networks was crucial.Was it reliable? Yes.Does it do everything well? No. - Call capability: call drops were very infrequent (this was based on travel and coverage). Call quality was only OK. Its not a crystal clear sound coming through this phone, and I noticed a much better sound while using my bluetooth instead of the built-in speaker. - Texting: the QWERTY keyboard was great...it made texting for work and personal use very quick. However, light finger touches tended to cause missed key strokes. - Camera: Mediocre to poor. Yes, I realize I bought a PHONE, not a camera, but I used all of the functions when available (my primary camera is actually a camera, not this phone). Pictures would routinely be blurred by the slightest movement. The shutter speed is very slow, making picture taking a difficulty science based on timing and steadiness. - Internet: Mediocre. Yes, you can surf the web...but don't count on many webpages to open. Even those optimized for mobile devices would have issues with embedded links. - Music. Yes, it plays music too...but I bought this PHONE to talk on, not use it to work out. It will NOT replace or even come close to replicating an mp3 player or iPod. The sound is mono (no stereo) and very "tinny". You can not use good headphones to improve quality; there's no standard headphone jack.

Reviews.Title: T469 GRAVITY CELL
Reviews.Author: LAMBROS
Reviews.Content: this cell is fine!  it's very clear, Perice, and very easy to use.  i also bought the plastic clear protective case which is very easy to install, and the slide feature to text works with no problem at all. i recommend this cell to anyone who still wants numbers to dial instead of a touch screen, and you still will be popular with your peers!  best.

Reviews.Title: My favorite Dumb phone
Reviews.Author: Mary Heimerman
Reviews.Content: I've bought several of these for my family.  We are not into data or smart phones, but we text constantly.  It is reliable, tough and very convenient.Cons: the slider design means that eventually you will need to get the cable repaired, but the good thing is that it is available and repairable; the camera stinks.I was very happy to find my favorite "dumb" phone for a reasonable refurb price.

Reviews.Title: very happy
Reviews.Author: lmh
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone for my mom so she can text.  I didn't want to upgrade my contract with tmmobile so I bought a phone with no contract.  This phone was shipped very quickly and works great.  It was exactly as described.  Works great, my mom is very happy with it and I think the price is very good too!

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: connie
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone as a replacement phone for my grandson.  He was very pleased with it and it was in excellent condition.

Reviews.Title: Cell Phone Replacement
Reviews.Author: Just DD
Reviews.Content: I needed a phone fast and thought I was getting a pretty good deal.  I do not think this phone was worth the price I paid for it ($70.44), I am using it and getting by, but I now feel I should have spent the extra money and bought a new one.I was somewhat disappointed for a number of reasons; 1)the phone has had water damage, 2) the battery also had water damage; 3)the charging cord that came with the phone is not the original cord, it works, but not as well as the original cord would; 4)and the screen was scratched as well as the casing.I will be more careful the next time I make a purchase.

Reviews.Title: Easy Phone to use and very sturdy!
Reviews.Author: Kim Michael
Reviews.Content: This is a sturdy, easy phone to use.Second one we have bought and it works great! We have had good luck with Samsung phones.

Reviews.Title: New Samsung T469 Gravity 2 Phone T-Mobile Orange
Reviews.Author: Michelle Ricketts
Reviews.Content: I ordered a new Samsung T469 Gravity 2 Phone online in good faith and the supplier sent me a used phone. The "W" on the phone key pad does not work. I requested a refund, but the supplier keeps avoiding my messages. Very bad experience with the phone and the supplier.

Reviews.Title: Great phone !
Reviews.Author: Julius Watson
Reviews.Content: I have had 3 of this phone. Could not find it for the price I paid for it on this site. Love it

Reviews.Title: Phone
Reviews.Author: Barbra S
Reviews.Content: Coudnt fin this phone anywhere but I found it here and it was great!! The price was good and it looked  brand new!!

Reviews.Title: Not happy with the Samsung phone
Reviews.Author: Terri Schmidt
Reviews.Content: The phone looked great but after a month or so the orange color on phone stated to flake off.  And the battery life is notthat great I have to charge me battery everynight - on my last phone I could go aleast two days.

Reviews.Title: Siren
Reviews.Author: Silver
Reviews.Content: I started out looking for phones with only a few expectations in mind. I want it to work, and I want it to be reliable. So I searched for phones that had good ratings, qwerty keyboards, and a reasonable coolness factor. I thought it was going to be perfect when I looked into the gravity 2. However I would caution everyone to go to a store to buy it. Not online. shopping in a store you can quickly and easily obtain, use, and return if the product is faulty. Don't chance buying online.

Reviews.Title: I was not disappointed. Good phone.
Reviews.Author: Simon N.
Reviews.Content: I received it within three or four days. I was pleased with he product. There were no scratches or dents. I turned it on and it worked perfectly. There are lots you can do it. It has great battery life too. The only problem I had with it was after about 7 months of having it, the some of numbers on the key pad were not working very well. Also the camera is absolutely terrible, the zoom is horrific and terrible picture quality. Although it does have a great editing system for the photos.But other than that it was great. The only other thing I would recommend is that you buy a screen protectors and a case. This phone easily gets scratches and tiny dents. But that's probably just me being reckless. I would recommend this phone for anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great service
Reviews.Author: mokiblue1
Reviews.Content: Product came quickly and as described! I was so pleased with the purchase that I bought two more.Great service!

Reviews.Title: Very good phone
Reviews.Author: Ky
Reviews.Content: Very Very good phone. 5 people in my family have this phone. It is amazing. Good quality pictures and videos. I can't find any flaws in this phone. The only thing that has ever happened was that my daughter dropped her phone in water at a golf course. Even then it didn't break all the way. It still texts and stuff. Just doesn't call. I am ordering another one for her. So it is great!!!

Reviews.Title: gravity 2 phone
Reviews.Author: sandy
Reviews.Content: Not very happy.I paid for a new phone and obviously packaging was opened and not sealed.I will not buy again for I have no idea if I received a used phone or refurbished phone when I payed for a new phone.You could tell the box also was not new and the seal was broken and a white tag attached to box.Now I know why.SHAME ON THIS COMPANY AND I SHOULD OF WENT WITH MY GUT FEELING AND LISTENED TO OTHER REVIEWS....SAME COMPLAINT AMONG OTHERS

Reviews.Title: Terrible key pad
Reviews.Author: colorada
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone from the seller and was really excited because it was exactly like the phone I had in the states and would work in Uruugay.  It works in Uruguay, but the keypad malfunctions.  It does not type the i's and e's very well, I have to press several times or very hard and it has been that way since the first day I got it.  Which was very upsetting since I bought it 'brand new'.

Reviews.Title: great purchased
Reviews.Author: bob ray
Reviews.Content: i was very pleased with purchased phone  delievery was very prompt, earlier than told  phone in great condition and price was excellant

ProductInfo.Name: New Samsung T469 Gravity 2 Phone T-Mobile Orange unlocked
